channel.title: RPSC Rajasthan Jobs on YOJNA PORTAL
channel.description: Recent content in RPSC Rajasthan Jobs on YOJNA PORTAL

item.title: RSSB NHM Contractual Posts Online Form 2025
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> RSSB Rajasthan NHM (Contractual Posts) 2025 Recruitment RSSB Rajasthan NHM (Contractual Posts) 2025 Recruitment Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) | RSMSSB Short Details of Notification RSSB NHM Advt No. : 01/2025 Important Dates Application Begin: 02/04/2025Last Date for Apply Online: 01/05/2025Pay Exam Fee Last Date: 01/05/2025RSSB NHM Exam Date: As per ScheduleAdmit Card Available: Before Exam Application Fee General / OBC: 600/-OBC NCL: 400/-SC / ST: 400/-Correction Charge: 300/-This fee is for one time registration, now after paying the OTR fee once, the candidate will not have to pay the application fee again and again.

item.title: Rajasthan RPSC Junior Chemist Online Form 2025
item.description: RPSC Junior Chemist Recruitment 2025 Rajasthan Public Service Commission (RPSC) Short Details of Notification RPSC Junior Chemist Advt No. : 02/2025 Important Dates Application Begin: 09/04/2025Last Date for Apply Online: 08/05/2025Last Date Pay Exam Fee: 08/05/2025Exam Date: as per ScheduleAdmit Card Available: Notified Soon Application Fee General / Other State: 600/-OBC / BC: 400/-SC / ST: 400/-Correction Charge: 500/-Pay the Exam Fee Through Cash at Rajasthan E Mitra Portal or Through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net BankingFrom 19 April 2023 onwards only one time fee will be charged for all the exams of Rajasthan Eligibility Age Limit as on 01/01/2026Minimum Age: 21 YearsMaximum Age: 40 Years Age relaxation as per rules of RPSC Junior Chemist Advt No.

item.title: Rajasthan RSSB 4th Class Employee Online Apply 2025

item.title: RRVUNL Technician, Operator, Plant Attendant Online Form 2025
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> RRVUNL Technician III, Operator & Plant Attendant Recruitment 2025 RRVUNL Technician III, Operator & Plant Attendant Recruitment 2025 Rajasthan Rajya Vidyut Utpadan Nigam Ltd (RRVUNL) Short Details of Notification Advt No : RVUN/Rectt.-2024/03 Important Dates Application Begin: 21/02/2025Last Date for Apply Online: 20/03/2025Pay Exam Fee Last Date: 20/03/2025RVUNL Exam Date: As per Schedule Application Fee General / Other State: 1000/-SC / ST / EBC / MBC / BC / EWS: 500/-Pay the Exam Fee Through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking Only.
